| HistoryText             = The Shadow Ghosts were martial artists who were led by [[Douglas Scott (Earth-616)|Razor-Fist]] and worked for the [[White Dragon Clan (Earth-616)|White Dragon Clan]]. They had black magic tattoos and possessed mystical abilities. The Shadow Ghosts assaulted the Mao Shan Pai Monastery in [[London]], resulting in a massacre with every monk dead or needing an ambulance. An ancient and powerful Chinese black magic spell book, the [[Chao-Siwang Shu]], was stolen from the monastery. While in the service to the White Dragon Clan they clashed repeatedly with [[Shang-Chi (Earth-616)|Shang-Chi]], the [[Daughters of the Dragon (Earth-616)|Daughters of the Dragon]], and [[Sons of the Tiger (Earth-616)|Sons of the Tiger]].{{r|Deadly Hands of Kung Fu Vol 2 2|4}}
